Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Northbound 34 South Michigan buses are rerouted via Langley, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Langley, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Morgan
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Morgan due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Morgan due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
